message: We take the emergency elevator to the first floor and dash out through the entrance.
Explosions are coming from the top of the tower. The people gathered outside are screaming.
But I don't look back. I'm too focused on getting Clear to safety.
He needs rest. There's only one place we can go.
Given Clear's condition, it seems prudent to avoid crowded streets. We head through the alleys, making for Glitter.
